docs.snippet: The only question that matters in Monday’s vote for the Baseball Hall of Fame is whether each candidate belongs in Cooperstown, but that is complicated by voting limits for the selection committee....
docs.lead_paragraph: The only question that matters in Monday’s vote for the Baseball Hall of Fame is whether each candidate belongs in Cooperstown, but that is complicated by voting limits for the selection committee.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observers that hundreds of sports writers will be limited to a maximum of 10 choices from a ballot with 34 names for upcoming Baseball Hall of Fame vote; holds that until writers are free to choose any player they deem worthy, process will remain unfair to candidates.

headline.main: In Hall Vote, Tainted Candidates and Split Tickets
headline.print_headline: In Hall Vote, Tainted Candidates and Split Tickets

docs.snippet: With the impending departure of Commissioner Bud Selig, Major League Baseball revamped its front office on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the impending departure of Commissioner Bud Selig, Major League Baseball revamped its front office on Thursday.
docs.abstract: MLB Roundup; incoming baseball commissioner Rob Manfred announces reshaping of baseball's front office ahead of the departure of Bud Selig in January; changes include naming Bob Bowman as president of business and media; other baseball news noted.

headline.main: Baseball Remakes Its Front Office as the Post-Selig Era Approaches
headline.print_headline: Baseball Remakes Its Front Office as the Post-Selig Era Approaches

docs.snippet: Wilt Chamberlain, who dominated basketball in the 1960s, is being honored on Friday with his own postage stamp. Spoiler alert: They’re taller than most stamps....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wilt Chamberlain, who dominated basketball in the 1960s, is being honored on Friday with his own postage stamp. Spoiler alert: They’re taller than most stamps.
docs.abstract: Basketball icon Wilt Chamberlain will have his image on a United States postage stamp, becoming first NBA star to be so honored; stamp will be unusually long in tribute to Chamberlain's 7-foot-1 frame.

headline.seo: Postage Stamp Pays Tribute to Wilt Chamberlain
headline.main: Wilt the Stilt Becomes Wilt the Stamp
